employee.confirmDeleteMessage: All data about him will be erased forever
employee.emptyList.title: Create the first one, it's simple
employee.emptyList.description: Your employer has blocked you from the organization
employee.role.administrator.name: Administrator
employee.role.administrator.description: The administrator has full access to the data and functions of the Doma.ai platform: he can delete, create or edit anything he wants. Administrators control the created organizations. An organization can have an unlimited number of administrators.
employee.role.contractor.name: Contractor
employee.role.contractor.description: The contractor performs work according to the assigned tickets. He does not have access to other sections and features of the Doma.ai platform.
employee.role.dispatcher.name: Dispatcher
employee.role.dispatcher.description: Dispatchers interact with the client and internal services of the management company: issue tickets, leave comments, change statuses, enter information based on meter readings and issue keys. Dispatchers have access to information about customers, accruals and technical staff, but they cannot edit, add or delete anything. You can restrict access to a specific housing stock in the ¬´Settings¬ª, in the ¬´Property scopes¬ª section.
employee.role.manager.name: Manager
employee.role.manager.description: The manager is the manager of the house: he interacts with clients, monitors the quality, deadlines and fulfillment of orders, controls the finances of the house - manages a house or a group of houses. Within the designated homes, the manager has access to ticket management, employee management, household reports, charges and payments. You can assign houses in the ¬´Property scopes¬ª in the ¬´Settings¬ª.
employee.role.foreman.name: Foreman
employee.role.foreman.description:
The site master is responsible for the performance and quality of work on the site. The site master distributes tasks to performers and sets up routing.
The master is responsible for the performance and quality of certain works on the site. The wizard distributes tasks to performers and sets up routing.
The master works according to the chosen specializations and at the designated houses. 
You can assign houses in the ¬´Property scopes¬ª in the ¬´Settings¬ª.
employee.role.technician.name: Technician
employee.role.technician.description:
The technician works with the tasks and performs the work. The technician does not have access to other sections and features of the system, except for applications.
The technician works according to the chosen specializations and at the assigned houses.
You can assign houses in the ¬´Property scopes¬ª in the ¬´Settings¬ª.

welcomePopup.title: About Dom√° platform
welcomePopup.step1.title: Hello!
welcomePopup.step1.text: Now you have access to CRM Doma. Here, management companies process tickets from residents, enter meter readings and control how their employees work.
welcomePopup.step2.title: Mobile applications
welcomePopup.step2.text: In addition to CRM, we have mobile applications for residents and employees of management companies. There, residents can pay receipts, and foreman can report on tickets.
welcomePopup.step3.title: Your time has come!
welcomePopup.step3.text: To make it easy for you to figure out how to use the service, we have provided tips. Start system setup - it just sounds complicated, try it üòä

incident.modalChangeStatus.toActualStatu: Is the entry up to date?
If the work is completed before the specified deadline, we will change the status of the entry. As well as the date and time the work was completed. The entry can be edited later.
The work was completed later than the deadline. We will change the status of the entry, as well as the date and time of completion of the work. The entry can be edited at any time.

If you want to change the outage status, be sure to correct the completion date to the current one.
